SELECT prod.id AS prod_id , prod.product_nm AS prod_nm , corp.site_url AS corp_url , corp.corp_zipcode AS corp_zipcode , corp.corp_address AS corp_address , corp.corp_addr_detail AS corp_addr_detail , corp.corp_manager AS corp_manager , corp_sub.crop_tel AS crop_tel , corp_sub.crop_email AS crop_email , corp.corp_tag AS corp_tag , prod.category_1 AS category1 , prod.category_2 AS category2 , prod.category_3 AS category3 , prod.category_4 AS category4 , file.real_path AS real_path , file.original_file_nm AS original_file_nm , COUNT(*) AS count FROM corporation corp INNER JOIN product prod ON corp.id = prod.corp_id AND prod.category_2 = #{cate2} AND prod.category_3 = #{cate3} LEFT OUTER JOIN corporation_sub corp_sub ON corp.id=corp_sub.crop_id LEFT OUTER JOIN file file ON prod.corp_id = file.tb_id AND file.tb_nm='corporation' AND file.file_seq='1' AND file.file_type='image' WHERE corp.del_fl='N' AND corp.corp_tag LIKE '%${tag}%' ORDER BY prod.id DESC, prod.product_nm ASC LIMIT 6
